trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual, selectable child controls of containers that implement <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 公開方法與屬性，以支援使用者介面自動化用戶端存取可實作容器的個別可選取子項控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>控制項模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的項目加入至選取項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the result of a call to AddToSelection is that a single item is selected, then send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> for that element; otherwise send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AddToSelection 呼叫的結果為已選取單一項目，然後傳送<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent>該項目; 否則傳送<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent>依適當情況。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這項規則不依存容器是否允許單一或多個選取項目，或在哪一個方法用來變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否選取項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is selected; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已選取的項目。，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 從選取的項目集合中移除目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這項規則不依存容器是否允許單一或多個選取項目，或在哪一個方法用來變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取任何選取的項目，然後選取 目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref> and acts as the container for the calling object.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者介面自動化提供者實作<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref>並作為呼叫物件容器。
